testcase.name: User should provide a description for that transfer
testcase.system-out: Given User is on GMIBank Login page.........................................passed When user provide valid username "Team5Customer"............................passed When user provide valid password "customerTeam5"............................passed When user click sign in button..............................................passed When verify username when user logged in...................................passed When user goes to Transfer Money under My Operation.........................passed Then verify user is on Customer Accounts page...............................passed When user select an account from FROM box "5778"............................passed When user select an account from TO box "5776"..............................passed When user provide an amount that user want to transfer "100"................passed When user provide description to the box "Transfer".........................passed Then verify the description is visible int the box "Transfer"...............passed
